content: frosty morning this hat works wonders to really make handspun and self-striping yarns shine the rounds are worked in a spiral so there is no seam and the stitches are worked into the back bar of the stitch creating a cool texture and a thick fabric for warmth this hat is easily customizable and you can try it on as you crochet to get the perfect fit materials ~ heavy worsted weight yarn approx 180 yards i used 1 skein of noro kochoran and had a little bit left over ~ h crochet hook 5 0mm ~ f crochet hook 3 75mm ~ interlocking stitch marker ~ tapestry needle abbreviations used double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch chain 5 with larger hook and join with a slip_stitch in first chain to form a ring body of hat round 1 8 single_crochet into the ring 8sc th **mark 8 single_crochet with a stitch marker to mark the beginning of the round move this marker with each round marking the first stich of the new round ** round 2 2 half_double_crochet s in each stitch to end 16 half_double_crochet **from round 3 on each half_double_crochet is done in the back bar or back bump of the stitch this pushes the v s forward ** round 3 *half_double_crochet in next stitch 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat from * to end 24 stitches round 4 *half_double_crochet in next 2 stitches 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat from * to end 32 stitches round 5 *half_double_crochet in next 3 stitches 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat from * to end 40 stitches round 6 *half_double_crochet in next 4 stitches 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat from * to end 48 stitches round 7 *half_double_crochet in next 5 stitches 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat from * to end 56 stitches round 8 *half_double_crochet in next 6 stitches 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat from * to end 64 stitches round 9 *half_double_crochet in next 7 stitches 2 half_double_crochet in next stitch repeat from * to end 72 stitches if you want a larger size hat circumference continue increasing in pattern as established until desired width then continue to rounds without increases as below rounds 10 25 half_double_crochet in each stitch 72 stitches you can try your hat on here and see how it will fit you want it to be 1 shorter than your desired length add or subtract rounds as you see fit brim ~ switching to the smaller hook and working into both loops of the stitches round 1 single_crochet 16 half_double_crochet 10 double_crochet 20 half_double_crochet 10 single_crochet 16 72 stitches round 2 repeat round 1 72 stitches round 3 single_crochet in each stitch and slip_stitch into beginning of round cut yarn and weave in ends enjoy if you have any questions please email me at susie@knitnatural com special thanks to pat b for naming this hat
